book.modpack.guide.general.intro.name: Waking Up
book.modpack.guide.general.intro.descrip: You open your eyes to see a new world.
book.modpack.guide.general.intro.page1.t: I opened my eyes, and a world unfolds in front of me. I shall discover all there is to discover.
book.modpack.guide.general.info.name: Info
book.modpack.guide.general.info.page1.te:
This guide books goal is to try to ease you into this world and into the Terrafirmacraft mod and others.\
\
To unlock new entries just do things, explore and gather resources. Hints are available. \
 The Terrafirmacraft guide book is also still available
book.modpack.guide.general.info.page2.te: If you don't know already; In your inventory menu on the right side there is a menu where you can search items, You can use [R] and [U] to browse recipes.
book.modpack.guide.general.sticks_and_st: By bashing two stones against each other I can make complex tools.

Such a sharp blade can chop a tree down! \
\
 (twigs can be found near trees)
I can use this to harvest straw from grass!
book.modpack.guide.general.clay.name: Locating Clay
book.modpack.guide.general.clay.page1.te: These plants have a shared secret under them!
book.modpack.guide.general.clay.page2.te: While walking around I noticed some soil to be much more elastic around certain groups of plants. I can form shapes out of this clay!
book.modpack.guide.general.food.name: Food and Water
book.modpack.guide.general.food.page1.te:
Around me I noticed that there are wild crops, berries and also animals. I won't be hungry for a while. \
\
Though I should eat a variety of nutrients to keep healthy!
book.modpack.guide.general.food.page2.te:
To satisfy my thirst I can drink from any water source, with no penalties \
 \
 (unless I had a delicious mouthful of ocean water)
book.modpack.guide.general.firepit.name: Making Fires
book.modpack.guide.general.firepit.page1:
By dropping a pile of items: \
- A log, \
- at least 3 stick and \
- any amount of straw \
\
 Then igniting them with firestarters I can make a fire pit!
book.modpack.guide.general.firepit.page2: To keep it going it needs a steady source of logs and can be relight.
book.modpack.guide.general.firepit.page3: I can only cook one item at once though.
